Jon Hanna wrote:
> Mike Schinkel wrote:
> >> From what I understood of what Mike was saying - I think 
> that is what 
> >> he meant.
> 
> Then we've just been using terms differently. I don't call 
> that URI construction, I call it hypermedia.

Ah, different meanings for the same terms.  The crux of more debates,
disagreements, and wars than anything besides differing values or battles
for scarce resources.

I make the point so strongly about URL construction because it means
different things to different people, and w/o a shared understanding
productive communication is stifled.

-- 
-Mike Schinkel
